notes: Seed entries are extracted from high-confidence recurring signals in listed resources.
Price ranges are operational seed ranges and should be refreshed with periodic market scans.
Glossary entries are marked needs_native_review for linguistic QA before production use.
Includes curated extraction from Lonely Planet Â· Pocket Marrakesh 7 (PDF, 161 pages), processed on 2026-02-07.
Places include RGB canonical image paths from Lonely Planet extraction under docs/lonely_planet_extracted/images_rgb_canonical/.

items.name: Jemaa el-Fna
items.short_description: Historic central square with changing atmosphere from daytime bustle to nighttime food and performances.
why_recommended: Repeated top attraction across official and editorial sources
items.hours_text: Open all day; most food stalls activate in early evening.
local_tips: Visit once in daylight and once after sunset for two different experiences.
scam_warnings: Confirm any performance/photo fee before accepting interactions.
do_and_dont: Do keep valuables zipped in dense crowds.
Do not agree to unclear service offers.

items.name: Koutoubia Mosque
items.short_description: Iconic minaret landmark and major visual reference near Jemaa el-Fna.
why_recommended: One of the most repeated landmarks in ranked lists
local_tips: Great exterior photo stop near sunset.

items.name: Bahia Palace
items.short_description: Ornate 19th-century palace known for courtyards, tilework, and carved wood.
why_recommended: Consistent top attraction across official and tour sources
local_tips: Go early to reduce queue time.

items.name: Jardin Majorelle
items.short_description: Famous botanical garden and color icon linked to Yves Saint Laurent heritage.
why_recommended: Repeated top attraction across nearly all guide styles
local_tips: Pre-book timed entry when possible in high season.

items.name: Zeitoun Cafe Kasbah
items.short_description: Practical Kasbah-side cafe frequently cited in quick recommendations.
why_recommended: Included in curated Marrakech dining shortlists from editorial resources.
items.hours_text: Verify hours before visiting (restaurant schedules can change seasonally).
local_tips: Reserve ahead for prime dinner slots where possible.
do_and_dont: Do confirm whether service charge is included before paying.
